website_summaries.verdict: A budget pick that many find as comfortable as pricier options. Just be sure you give it plenty of time to expand.
pros: Removable, washable, water resistant polyester cover
cons: Ships compressed and requires up to 2 weeks of expansion upon arrival
The mattress never fully expands for some customers

customer_reviews.title: Peoples incorrect use of product...
customer_reviews.text: QUIT buying this bed for your dogs and giving bad reviews, this is a BABY mattress meant for small CHILDREN not animals. So yes the dogs will tear up and pee on them and whatnot but dogs do more damage than a sleeping baby.... if you’re going to write a review on a product use the product correctly the way the product was meant to be used...people who want this mattress for their children what to know the parent outlook on it for kids not their animals...you all wasted my time writing about a money waste because your dog ate the bed when I wanted to know an actual review that mattered for my child...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It expanded beautifully no issues
customer_reviews.text: Received the mattress Wednesday and let it expand as directed for 48 hours. It expanded beautifully no issues, I’m pretty sure it was done after the 24 hours but I waited anyway. Fits perfectly in the crib. I was skeptical because some of the reviews were bad but all is well here. It didn’t quite expand to 5 inches but it’s ok. Soft but not too soft I will update the review as soon as baby starts sleeping on it.
customer_reviews.author: Jaimie

customer_reviews.title: I waited the 48 hours before I put it on the toddler bed and it expanded just fine. Very comfy and mimics the memory foam topper
customer_reviews.text: I bought this mattress for my 2 year old to sleep on while I transitioned from co-sleeping. He sleeps in much longer now. I waited the 48 hours before I put it on the toddler bed and it expanded just fine. Very comfy and mimics the memory foam topper I have on my mattress. I would definitely recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfy unlike any other toddler bed
customer_reviews.text: We love this mattress! BUT ARE SO DISAPPOINTED! Well we loved it.. Since it isn't plastic the cover is the best part of item. The first time my daughter has an accident I thought it was going to be done, BUT it was totally waterproof and the cover was so easy to wash! PERFECT! Until the 2nd time I washed it and the zipper came off. It's so comfortable and great quality I wish it would have lasted longer than 3 months. SO DISAPPOINTED
customer_reviews.author: Jenny L

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware
customer_reviews.text: I usually have good experiences with things I've ordered on Amazon. Not this time! I bought 2 of these mattresses and neither has expanded to more than 2" in depth! I followed the instructions on both; opened them up and allowed them to lay flat (for 6 days now!). I have "fluffed" as much as one can on highly compressed foam and both mattresses not only don't fill their zipped outter cover as shown, but they are not even smooth! One end of each is fuller than the other end and both have various ridges. The insert in the box says " Do not return your product". Terribly disappointed. Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: LeW

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for: low quality.
customer_reviews.text: This is a classic "you get what you pay for" situation. I let the mattress sit for a month in the sun, with a fan blowing on it, in the crib so it could get air on all sides, and without any of the 3 flimsy covers on and it still remained compressed on two sides. The covers had strings everywhere inside and I was skeptical as to whether I'd be able to rezip them. I've put in for a return but am having a hard time finding a way to return it since it will definitely not fit back in the original packaging. Save yourself the hassle and spend a little more money on something of higher quality.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Smith

customer_reviews.title: Great dog bed!
customer_reviews.text: I have gone through many crib mattresses for my dogs. I shopped around and thought this would be better than the spring ones. This one is so much more comfortable (I tested it out)! It doesn’t sink in when even my 130# mastiff lays on it. I like the inner zip off cover too which should make clean up easier. Contrary to other reviews I didn’t notice a bad smell upon unpackaging. I took the cover off and laid it flat and it was fluffed up to size in no time. I wouldn’t hesitate to buy more!! Paired with the amazon basics crib sheet it’s a perfect combo!
customer_reviews.author: crystalpumpkinpup

customer_reviews.title: Great Mattress!
customer_reviews.text: This mattress is just what I was looking for! I let it expand for 3 full days. It is thick and firm. I am using it for a dog bed and I see it lasting for years to come!
customer_reviews.author: NLR121

customer_reviews.title: Best baby mattress!
customer_reviews.text: bought this for my first daughter in 2018 and she slept SO good on it. She still uses it. It comes rolled up in a compeessed air bag so you gotta open it and let it take its shape. Basically like a Casper or cloud mattress for adults...the ones that come in a box. Same same. This is my second purchase of this specific mattress and neither had this chemical smell I've read about and both are firm yet comfortable for baby! My daughter is such a good sleeper and I think this mattress is part of the reason why.
customer_reviews.author: Starnes

customer_reviews.title: Such mixed reviews so here’s mine..
customer_reviews.text: I shopped and compared dozens of mattresses for my 2 year old I figured I’d take a chance on this one. People said many things like: didnt expand, bothered my kids skin, smelled, etc. So mine expanded in 4 hours next to a space heater in 80° room. Never smelled funky to me. BUT my sons face broke out BAD. Very red rash. So I hand washed the cover with dreft and hung it up to dry. Put the cover back on and he’s been rash free for 2 days now. He slept a lot better on this foam mattress. Softer than other toddler mattresses.
customer_reviews.author: Corrine Maus

customer_reviews.title: So comfy that I want to lay on it myself
customer_reviews.text: Best part is that it isn't plastic, so the tossing and turning doesn't Make obnoxious crinkle noises that wake you up. Big enough to fill out the sheets and keep it tight, but not too big to keep the sheets from clinging underneath. It is very nice and comfortable. Only downside is you will also need to buy one of the mattress protectors. Honestly a very good investment considering they can sleep on them for 3-5 years with a toddler bed. Our last child had the plastic coated kind and the plastic would crack after a couple years and become very uncomfortable. Wish I had gotten this for him!
customer_reviews.author: K&M

customer_reviews.title: Great mattress, great price
customer_reviews.text: We recently moved and I have discovered we have bed bugs infection in my baby’s room I got rid of her old mattress and ordered this one . After reading most reviews I was a bit worried about how bad the smell was and how long will it take for the mattress to get to the full size, I’m happy to report that we had NO ODOR and within few hours it was all ready to set up , I got also the bed buds crib protector . REALLY good quality mattress for an affordable price. Our old crib mattress was way more expensive and was not even close to this quality. Don’t think twice, order it
customer_reviews.author: May

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING
customer_reviews.text: I love this mattress. I have purchased it twice. Once for my 2 year old and once for my 7 month old. It comes with a protective cover which is really nice when things get messy. You just unzip it all and throw it in the wash. I've had to do that multiple times in the past 2 years. It always comes clean, and it never touches the mattress so that always stays clean of messes! Its firm so that they wont suffocate, but soft enough to still be comfortable. I would compare it to a temperpedic mattress honestly. I love this thing. I will purchase it a third time if I ever need to
customer_reviews.author: Emma

customer_reviews.title: Gold Cert and perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: So glad I found this mattress. I was looking for an organic one but couldn’t find one with a good review and decent price. This has a Gold cert which is the next best. I read several reviews about it not filling out right or being cheap. But this mattress filled out just fine and has the perfect shape. My son sleeps fine on it. Overall well worth the price and glad I found it.
customer_reviews.author: TXShell

customer_reviews.title: BUY IT JUST DO IT AND SLEEP TONIGHT!
customer_reviews.text: I put a cover on this immediately after I unrolled it from the wrapping. No funky smells, no chemicals or airing out necessary. I was concerned when one end didn’t quite fill up like the rest but after a day longer it was perfect! My 2.5 year old daughter now sleeps during the night...as in all night hallelujah! Her old mattress was plastic and crappy, it had springs that I bet dug into her and made sleepy miserable. I got her a toddler memory foam pillow and we are in business for the best nights sleep EVER! So glad we took a chance on this!
customer_reviews.author: JakeTop Contributor: Swimming

customer_reviews.title: It’s so comfy, I’d sleep on it!!
customer_reviews.text: Why buy a mattress for your child if you wouldn’t sleep on it yourself? I feel bad to admit, but I’ve bought those firm plastic mattresses before and it’s no wonder why my children didn’t want to sleep in their crib/toddler bed!!! I am soooo happy I read thru this one and it was just as expected! It’s firm, yet sooooooo soft!!! Like memory foam!! It feels like my $3k bed!! And my toddler LOVES it!!!! I highly recommend this bed for anyone looking for a mattress for their baby/toddler! 🙌🏼 Great price! And comes in quickly!! Just click “Buy Now” already! Lol 🙌🏼💙
customer_reviews.author: Nessa

customer_reviews.title: Great crib mattress for great price
customer_reviews.text: Seems like a great quality mattress for half the price of other crib mattresses. I was nervous with it being foam that it would be too soft for a crib mattress. It is the perfect firmness but still comfortable for baby. After reading reviews, I took off the outer mattress protectant cover when I first received it. The mattress was fully inflated/“un-compressed” after 24 hours. A couple corners are a little more shrunken in then the rest but only by 1/2 an inch at most. Can’t attest to the quality of the waterproof mattress cover but it probably wouldn’t hurt to add an additional cover over it.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: HAPPY WITH PURCHASE!
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this purchase. Took mattress out the box, it was vacuumed sealed and then wrapped in plastic, so very protected. The mattress does not have a smell, its the plastic. Its says to wait 48 hours for it to fluff up but it took maybe 4 hours. My coworkers joked that I went from a crib size to a queen size, haha. Mattress fit perfectly in the crib, no issues. No snags or stains on the mattress, completely brand new and as described. It's firm yet comfortable. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: omgitsflo

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, fits perfectly, great mattress!
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I did so much research on finding the perfect crib mattress before we finally stumbled into this one. We took a chance after reading many reviews and couldn't be happier. Many customers complained about a weird chemical smell that lingered after being unboxed, but we didn't have that problem. We left it out to air out and puff up and within 24 hours it was ready. It felt very comfortable and our two month old has taken many naps in his crib and seems to sleep comfortably each time. Definitely glad we chose this mattress.
customer_reviews.author: Marceline

customer_reviews.title: My baby sleeps so well on this mattress. Don't let these other reviews sway your opinion.
customer_reviews.text: I was very worried that this mattress would not set up right. So far there have been no issues! I have given it 24 hours to inflate and get right, and i'm assuming that's where many people didn't do it correctly, I let it set for 24 hours and have had no issues. my infant sleeps so well and i love the size and height of it. The price is competitive to some mattresses I found at buy buy baby.
customer_reviews.author: Benny

customer_reviews.title: Quite firm, great quality
customer_reviews.text: We got this mattress as a replacement. Our daughter has NEVER slept well on her previous mattress. We figured it was too firm or something, and thought this foam mattress would be a little more squishy. First of all, it is not squishy. Not even a little bit. This is a very firm mattress (totally fine for an infant). But she does sleep better on this mattress than her other one. Definitely feels high quality and for this price point, I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: William

customer_reviews.title: Perfect and affordable
customer_reviews.text: This product was recommended by a friends who i highly trust, So despite my miss givings that it was I expensive (I want my little one to be safe and comfy!) I clicked buy. I just received it today and it’s perfect. I removed all the plastic, laid it flat and made sure to adjust the corners of the cover to allow for the foam to inflate there. Within minutes it was fully fluffed out, though it takes a little longer to firm up. Fits my delta crib great!
customer_reviews.author: jrun

customer_reviews.title: Seems good so far!
customer_reviews.text: If anyone was questioning getting this mattress due to the reviews (people saying it would not expand fully)... they must have improved packaging or something since then. We just unrolled ours and put it on a flat table and it immediately expanded. It says to leave it out for 72 hours to allow for full expansion but the picture was taken immediately after removing the packaging and the mattress cover. I am pretty pleased with it so far! 😀
customer_reviews.author: Holly Olteanu

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Choice!
customer_reviews.text: We have purchased two of these in the last year and a half, one for each of our daughters. Be careful not to cut the mattress when opening the box. There is a thick plastic cover over the mattress inside the box; however, if you are not careful you will cut through it to the mattress. The mattress takes 24-48 hours to fully expand. Once expanded it is very comfortable. My oldest daughter loves her mattress. My youngest is too young for me to discern her opinion, but I am sure she will eventually give her seal of approval. Low price - Quick Shipping - Quality Product.
customer_reviews.author: Carlo LaMonica

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING QUALITY
customer_reviews.text: I'm so glad I splurged on this! I had no idea foam crib mattresses were a thing! My daughter loves this mattress and sleeps all night. I love that it doesnt crinkle when she moves! The water resistant cover is not noisy whatsoever! I've washed/dryed mine many times with no issues. Like to add I dont have an agitator in my washer and I dry on medium heat! Nothing has gotten through the pad and she's had lots of accidents and spills! Feels like this will definitely last until we move to twin in a few years! Had no issues with expansion fits her toddler bed like a glove with no gaps!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Mattress
customer_reviews.text: I did what other reviewers said and took all of the coverings off of it as soon as it came in.. I rolled it the opposite direction that it was rolled up in and let it sit flat in my living room floor, I also flipped it every hour to make sure both sides got air and it fully plumped up in about 6 hours, it is now a full sized toddler/crib mattress, I have it on my daughter's toddler bed, it's firm with just a little softness that even infants can safely sleep on.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Great crib mattress! Worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: This mattress is a very great quality, it’s also nice and quiet- it doesn’t have that crinkly loud waterproof plastic stuff that other mattresses have. It is so soft and comfortable but also firm and my baby has a great sleep. I wish that they made adult size mattresses out of this stuff! Looks comfy I want to sleep on it! LOL - My only complaint is that the cover says do not machine wash- only hand wash, I feel like that will be a big tedious problem for me.
customer_reviews.author: :)AmazonCustomer

customer_reviews.title: Better sleep!
customer_reviews.text: My 2 yo was waking several times a night (more than her usual) and having a hard time getting comfortable on her previous mattress. I got this one on a warehouse sale and would gladly pay full price for it. She is sleeping through the night again! And falling asleep isn't as hard for her! Very comfortable. I did not have any issues with it not inflating from the box. I set it out flat for 24 hours and she used it that next night. No bad smell for me either! Worth the buy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bit of a disappointment
customer_reviews.text: I first want to say that I have bought many many things from Graco but never again! I bought this mattress because one of the selling points was that it was leak resistant because I was potty training my daughter. Leak resistant it is not! I proceed to call Graco about a warranty replacement...they asked for pictures which is fine and I sent it to them however they just keep asking for more pictures really it boils down to the fact that they don't stand behind their product and ask the consumer to jump through every single hoop to claim a warranty for this thing!!!
customer_reviews.author: M Carolin

customer_reviews.title: This mattress seems nice at a decent price (if it fully inflates or rises).
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to love this mattress because I saw so many good reviews and the price isn’t one to break the bank. This mattress seems nice at a decent price (if it fully inflates or rises). The one I ordered was left three days so that it could rise but the part that we put towards the feet did not inflate. This means that that particular side has to be towards the bottom of the bed at all times because if not, my son’s head will be lower than his feet. The only reason we didn’t return it, is because we quickly discarded the packaging it came in.
customer_reviews.author: Cariann

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed with Shipping.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this two weeks ago it came in a week later then expected. My daughter has yet to sleep on it, I unboxed it Monday and it took about an hour to fully pop up from being boxed. It had a strange odor, I'm assuming its from the bag and shipping. Seems to be of good quality but I am very disappointed in the shipping, we moved into a new place and she had to sleep in bed with me until it came. Im hoping I don’t have to Re-transition her all over again.
customer_reviews.author: ashley Weatherwalks

customer_reviews.title: Just buy it!
customer_reviews.text: This is a wonderful little mattress! After unwrapping it I removed the mattress cover to let it fully expand and wash the cover. It took less than a day to fully expand, all corners popped up and there wasn’t really any smell that I noticed. I’ve laid down with my daughter on the mattress to help her get back to sleep after a bad dream and it’s pretty comfortable even for me! My daughter sleeps well on it and it’s quiet!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Carter

customer_reviews.title: Buy this you wont regret it!
customer_reviews.text: Buy it! Do your little one a favor and buy this ! She was used to our memory gel foam mattress so I was set on getting her her own when it was time to stop co sleeping. This mattress is so thick and plush yet firm which makes me believe it'll last a long time. It fits standard crib sheets and it's so easy to clean just unzip the cover and wash. My baby doesnt even notice the difference when we put her in her crib after falling asleep in our bed ! She can sleep at nap time on her own while watching her shows it's very comfortable for her.
customer_reviews.author: Celina

customer_reviews.title: Expanded to full size and firmness QUICK
customer_reviews.text: I opened this up and it expanded to its full size, squared edges and all within a minute. I left it on a flat surface for a few more hours and flipped it periodically. I didn't notice the foul odor that some reviews listed. A faint plastic smell, but I left it in the living room and never noticed anything after the initial removal from the bag. Even directly putting my nose to the mattress didn't reveal this foul odor others mention. A great buy, and I can happily replace if the cover and (separate purchase) waterproof covers don't hold up to a toddler's periodic urine.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle

customer_reviews.title: Awesome will recommend to friends for sure
customer_reviews.text: Foot it early . No issues with it not going to the normal size came up in seconds like it was never in the box rolled up !! Very happy will see how it helps him sleep for nap time tomorrow! Or the next day does not have a bad smell like others said it did . I’m very happy. Firm enough for him to sleep on he doesn’t like hard beds so this is perfect. I’m very satisfied with this bed . Fits perfectly in our crib as well Greco older style .
customer_reviews.author: Brandi Bushek

customer_reviews.title: Great mattress, bad packaging.
customer_reviews.text: So I would have given this mattress 5 stars as I love the quality and feel of the mattress. My baby sleeps so well on it and I love that when he moves around it doesn’t make any noise. However, each time it was sent there were black marks on the Inside of the sealed packaging. I’m not sure if it had been used before or was maybe scuffed before being packaged. Amazon was awesome in sending a replacement but there was a mark on the new one as well. We have decided to keep it though because baby boy loves it so much.
customer_reviews.author: Jessie

customer_reviews.title: Happy camper
customer_reviews.text: We co sleep with our little one and knew we had to get her a memory foam mattress as ours is. This bed did not disappoint and price is reasonable. I did not detect a smell out of packaging. It lifted right away and left it to do its thing for three days. My toddler loves her new bed and is happily sleeping.
customer_reviews.author: Cassandra P.

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, firm crib mattress
customer_reviews.text: We actually got this mattress for my son's toddler bed. It came rolled up in the mail, and we laid it flat for two days while it inflated to its normal size. There was a slight smell immediately upon unrolling it, but it quickly dissipated. It puffed out pretty well within one day and was totally ready by the second day. It is firm but comfortable, and fits perfectly in the bed. We outfitted it with a fitted sheet from Carter's and a waterproof cover (although I believe this mattress supposedly already is waterproof.) I'd buy it again easily--you really can't beat the convenience!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Hayes

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Mine inflated to full height in about an hr after removing the packaging. I removed all the covers and cut the lining cover off the mattress and tossed it, it doesn't seem to be needed anyways with all the other coverings on it. I use a waterproof mattress protector on it before placing the fitted sheet. My son went from waking up twice a night on my old crib mattress that was just too soft and over used from my first son, to sleeping through the night till 6am on this mattress! It fits my crib way better than the old mattress as well, it fits snug in all four corners now and on the sides
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Multi-purpose mattress
customer_reviews.text: DISCLAIMER: this was not bought for a human child. I have a Doberman who is 12 and has difficulty with mobility. I couldn’t find a pet bed that was thick enough for him to not be laying on the floor basically and that wasn’t $200. So here I am reviewing a baby bed that I bought for my dog. He enjoys it and it has enough padding for him that he doesn’t experience pressure points. He sleeps all night but drools so I can’t give a high star rating for the waterproofness. But for $60 I was able to purchase a good mattress for my “baby”.
customer_reviews.author: Kristina Holyfield

customer_reviews.title: No odor, would recommend.
customer_reviews.text: So first of all I loved the fact that the mattress did not have any odor at all!!! , the mattress is also not like an adult memory foam mattress (too soft once ur laying on it) , which I was a bit worried bc kids should sleep in something “firm” but I wanted something comfy so I actually liked this mattress and would recommend. I just received it last week and havent had a complaint , its def comfier than the first mattress I had bought for my toddler.
customer_reviews.author: yvf

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: So nice this is probably one of the nicest crib mattresses I have seen. It is soft and actually feels comfortable to sleep on, my baby hasn’t used it yet it’s airing out, but I’m sure she’s going to love it, the water proof covering is such a nice touch too and it’s soft so extra comfort with the sheet added. Super excited about this I also have noticed no smell at all what so ever that I read in some other reviews
customer_reviews.author: Carly

customer_reviews.title: One of the best
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the best toddlers mattresses I have purchased. It’s very comfortable. The fact that it comes already in a waterproof cover is a MAJOR plus. My kids absolutely love it. I bought this for my 4 year old son when he was 2 and he sleeps in his bed ever since. So when my second son now 2 was ready for his toddler bed we purchased is for him as well and he loves his bed as well. They both like to spend time in their room and just play on their beds rest and play. Their comfort is our priority and this mattress is definitely worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Vendula Tims

customer_reviews.title: 100% perfect
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect, so much better then those thick plastic bouncy crib mattresses. I love it, baby loves it, I love that it comes with a mattress protection pad, great quality. Totally worth it. Also as a side not I’m shocked to have read reviews, saying there was a chemical smell? There was no smell at all. It was perfect.
customer_reviews.author: chris elliott

customer_reviews.title: Great baby mattress
customer_reviews.text: My baby sleeps so good on this mattress. I let it sit on the floor after opening for a few days to let it fully expand. It expanded good and didn't have any smells. It comes with a cover but I also have a breathable mattress cover on it for extra protection in case of spit up or diaper leak. My little one is 8 months old and sleeps through the night and takes naps in his bed. I hope this mattress lasts a long time. Also haven't felt any heat from baby laying and he hasn't got hot. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Tabitha

customer_reviews.title: Best Crib mattress
customer_reviews.text: This is the best crib mattress I have ever used and I have 6 kids. It is not waterproof, but paired with a good mattress protector it will last way longer than any vinyl/plastic covered crib mattress. I bought this for my daughter's toddler bed. I was worried when it came all vacuum packed that it wouldn't be supportive. I just hadn't received a mattress this way before. It's honestly comfortable enough for me to sleep on. I'm picky about my mattresses but actually fell asleep on this beside my daughter while she was sick. I didn't wake up hurting. It's very comfortable and supportive.
customer_reviews.author: M J

customer_reviews.title: Good mattress
customer_reviews.text: My 2 year old was a great sleeper and then suddenly woke multiples times through out each night. I had a cheap plastic mattress in his crib and thought maybe that was the problem. I let the mattress expand and I did notice that one side did not expand fully like the other side. I tried “fluffing” it. Nothing helped. It’s not bad enough to make a huge difference. It is definitely more comfortable for my son and he is sleeping through the night again. I can’t say the mattress is the reason why or if it was just a regression.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: No regrets
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable. I use this mattress in my 3 year old son's toddler bed. It fits perfectly and has fit the bedset we bought him. I can attest to the comfort of it, as I lay with him at night until he goes to sleep and even I (at 37 weeks pregnant, no less) am comfortable lying on this mattress. It's the favorite spot of both my 3 year and and my 1.5 year old to hang out during the day. He has spilled water on his bed before (6 oz plastic bottle) and the waterproofing of this mattress cover kept his actual mattress completely dry. No complaints at all with it.
customer_reviews.author: Brooke Patterson

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Love this. It’s really thick, aired up nicely within minutes of taking it out of the packaging, my baby sleeps comfortably, doesn’t smell bad at all, would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Boone

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product, ruff ruff!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased 2 of these mattresses back in 2017 and they are still holding up great as are the waterproof covers, and get this, they were for my Danes.(160 lbs each) So... I would think they would hold up for a child, multiple children over many years most likely. As any large and giant breed dog owner will tell ya dog beds wont hold up that long and their more expensive. I had to find an alternative and found these. The reason for a review after over 2 years(Im sure I made one after I bought them also) is to get exact info for a referral to a friend. Absolutely love the waterproof cover.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfy and Does the Job!
customer_reviews.text: I let it out of the box to fully unpress for a good 2 weeks (I didn't need it ASAP) but after day 1 it was totally ready to go. I included pics of our Graco Crib as well, so you can see how thick it is. It has a jersey-fit matteress sheet on it current but came out of the box wrapped in an air tight plastic bag and nice and clean!
customer_reviews.author: Lin and Kurt Wiggins

customer_reviews.title: Perfect dog bed.
customer_reviews.text: Got this for our German Shepherd. Dog beds I had ordered were just rammed in their box for $80. Got this and it’s just awesome! There was no odor. Crib sheet and protecter can be tossed in the wash. I actually sawed off about 5” to add in the top under the sheet for head elevation. Holding up just wonderful.
customer_reviews.author: Angelique Nordeen

customer_reviews.title: Nice but very hard
customer_reviews.text: I got this mattress cause my friend recommended it for my daughters toddler bed I bought and it's a nice mattress but it's very hard and I think my daughter is uncomfortable on it. It's been 2 months of her sleeping on it and she keeps waking up in the middle of the night and it takes her forever to fall asleep. Constantly moving around. I love the water resistant cover it comes with and it inflates fast but I just dont think my 2 year old likes it.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal L

customer_reviews.title: Nice matress
customer_reviews.text: Great mattress, it puffed up out of the box quickly. No weird smells. My 5 year old slept on it the first night and enjoyed it. It fits great in the crib, baby brother is happy. Haven’t tested the waterproof aspect yet but I’m sure it will be fine. One con is I noticed it says not to wash the cover in a washing machine, but not a huge deal.
customer_reviews.author: Mama K

customer_reviews.title: Fits PERFECTLY into Ikea's SNIGLAR crib
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome mattress. It is tough enough that my son doesn't sink in but soft enough that he falls asleep within minutes! The mattress cover it comes with is great, too. My son is a HEAVY drooler and the mattress has not one stain because of the washable cover. I will say to air dry or dry the cover on low heat so it doesn't shrink. It can stretch back to normal size, but it is such a pain.
customer_reviews.author: Khaiylah Cruz

customer_reviews.title: SOOOO happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.text: I read about 50 reviews before buying this crib mattress. It arrived earlier than expected, first off, which was great! I dropped it off at home, took off the plastic and the mattress protector and left it on the living room floor. We ran errands for about 3-4 hours, and when we got home, it was fully expanded and ready to be slept on! I didn't notice a strong smell, even though the other reviews said it smelled like chemicals. My toddler slept in it last night and he said it was "very comfy!" Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Luella Krautkramer

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately I have to agree with the other unhappy buyers. I’m now on day 5 of letting the mattress “fluff” and it’s still wanky. I’ve gone and walked over the mattress to help speed the process up, and let the trapped air out but it doesn’t matter. One end looks nice and full, the other is flat and very uneven throughout from one end to the other. A lot of people asking about using for a dog bed, probably better off! I guess we all get what we paid for. I would rather have spent more and gotten better quality.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle T.

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: This mattress is really nice. It is cool and comfortable to the touch. Be careful to read the instructions though or it will not properly "inflate" upon opening. Unroll it and lay it down flat and allow it to fully expand over a 48 hour time period. It may require additional "fluffing" as with a pillow. Mine expanded really well and I only had to fluff out one end of it. Other than that it seems perfect so far. My son is going to love swapping over from the stiff bassinet to the more soft crib mattress.
customer_reviews.author: Satisfied

customer_reviews.title: Cats like it for now
customer_reviews.text: So baby boy won't be here until June but the cats have made it their own until then (I'll wash it obviously). It's nice and firm and fit comfortably in our crib with no gaps. I did unroll it and let it expand/air out in the floor for two days to let the corners fill in. Overall I'm pleased so far so we'll see how little one sleeps on it.
customer_reviews.author: Stormy

customer_reviews.title: Great quality for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my second daughter and was surprised when I received it! Much more comfy than I expected and it’s definitely worth the cost! I can’t speak much for sleep quality because my daughter has yet to learn to self soothe 😕 BUT I know she’s comfy and the mattress doesn’t have that plastic-y sound like I had with my first daughter.
customer_reviews.author: taylor.mb

customer_reviews.title: Not as soft as I thought it would be.
customer_reviews.text: I thought it would be softer & it’s somewhat softer than the horrible spring ones that come with most cribs but not much softer, I got it for my 2 year old he is still in a crib/toddler bed & he definitely seems to need something a bit softer, he is just so used to our bed after going through a few weeks of being scared of the dark & refusing to sleep in his bed & going back to his bed was a big difference, even with the change of crib/toddler bed mattress
customer_reviews.author: K-Bee&E

customer_reviews.title: Great comfort and NO smell
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. My 5 month old has been sleeping a lot better. Almost through the night. I read reviews before purchasing and was Leary of the smell people talked about. This mattress had virtually no smell to me and I have great sense of smell. I am a freak about my house smelling fresh and clean and only use natural cleaning products. So any type of chemical smell I would notice. The mattress is soft but firm (alot like my tempurpedic) which the baby seems to enjoy. Would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Helllo 12+ hours Of sleep a night!
customer_reviews.text: This mattress is heavenly. My little one LOVES it and sleeps like a rock. (10mo old). His previous mattress was super springy and bouncy. Once he was standing he would fall when walking around his crib while holding on to the ledge, so much due to the bounciness. Then when he’d sleep, he’d roll into the edges and be smashed against the edges. I had enough. This one is firm, but comfy soft. No more falling and no more smashed in edges. Sleeps 12+ hours a night now with NO disruption 💯
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for dogs!
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this mattress to use as a dog bed. I wanted something that was easy to clean on a regular basis and this mattress fits the bill! I remove the fitted sheet and zip off the waterproof cover once a week to wash so it doesn't smell, the cover dries and goes back on very easily! The only downside is the time it takes to fully decompress, I believe the instructions say 72 hours but ours took a week or two honestly. It helped to walk around on it a bit every few days, not sure how that worked but it seemed to help. Ultimately a great purchase, we ended up getting two!
customer_reviews.author: EV92

customer_reviews.title: Zero Complaints!
customer_reviews.text: This mattress was gifted to me for my then infant son back in 2017. He’s almost 2 now and we have NEVER had any issues with this mattress. I haven’t had any issues with the mattress falling apart or tearing. I haven’t had any issues with stains or discoloration. I haven’t had any issues with the mattress fully expanding. The cover is so easy to remove and clean and put back on. We love this mattress so much that we will be buying another one for our next baby which is due soon. Our current mattress will be transferred to a toddler bed for my son to continue to use.
customer_reviews.author: Rach08

customer_reviews.title: Perfect ride
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my large (St Bernard, 140 #) dogs to ride in the back seat of the truck. They rode 1500 miles on our trip to Yellowstone and loved it! I know it’s not meant for this; but was the perfect size for the back floorboard in our crewcab.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Mattress
customer_reviews.text: I was sceptical to buy this due to the reviews it had... my experience was completely different. I bought this mattress for my autistic son because he's been sleeping on my foam mattress (yes, I cosleep) and rufuses to sleep on any other kind of mattress. this mattress fluffed up the way it was supposed to. I'm not going to write about how he sleeps on it because I'm just now trying to get him to sleep on his own. I did not smell a crazy smell, and the edges fluffed up the way they were supposed to. And the mattress looks great. 5 stars from me.
customer_reviews.author: Alison

customer_reviews.title: Awsome mattress
customer_reviews.text: Am really glad I bought this mattress , delivered fast well packaged. Opens it followed the instructions . I removed the matress case before the mattress gets expanded and washed it in delicate cycle . Put the mattress flat and it reached 4 inches within half an hour. Has mild smell but it went away really fast, I also removed the two mesh that was under the original case/sheet to let the corners take the full nice shape . All good nice soft yet firm and really good for infants and toddlers . Am really happy . Good quality no strong smell , just buy it and you wont regret it .
customer_reviews.author: Marsho

customer_reviews.title: We're purchase again
customer_reviews.text: This came rolled up really tightly. We laid it out, and let it expand for about four days. We had this luxury of time because we didn't need it immediately. We did have to "punch shape" the tightest end to help the expansion along. (Who knows how long it had been rolled up in the warehouse) That said, we would make this purchase again, as it really is a good mattress at a reasonable price, and our two-month-old grandson slept.... well, like a baby! Our daughter-in-law even remarked that he slept very well here - whether that is due to the mattress or other factors, I cannot say, but we are glad we purchased this mattress.
customer_reviews.author: LW

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful mattress.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this mattress for my sister, for her little bambina. It expanded well and is very comfy. No noise is made of the baby rolls, very quiet mattress. I would highly recommend this mattress to anyone. If I knew of it for my two babes I would've bought this instead of the plastic mattresses. It will also switch to a toddler bed which is wonderful since the mattress is very well made and comfortable. In the pictures you cant really see the mattress itself, but my sister loved it!
customer_reviews.author: _mrs.keen

customer_reviews.title: Watch the corners
customer_reviews.text: Read through a lot of crib mattress reviews before finally deciding on this one. We had no issues with unpacking it and leaving it for a couple of days to expand. However once we put a crib sheet on, I noticed that the corners were squashed in. When placed inside the crib, it would leave a decent size gap. While it might be okay for a non mobile child initially, eventually as the child becomes more mobile, it would be a safety hazard. We ultimately decided to return this mattress for a different one.
customer_reviews.author: S. Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Does NOT fully expand
customer_reviews.text: This mattress does not fully expand on one end.I have allowed it to expand for over 3 full days... It arrives rolled in a "log" shape and the end that is the most tightly compressed on the inside of the roll in the shipping box is at least an inch shorter than the other end after allowing 3 days of expansion. I have fluffed it, jumped on it and even put it out side on a flat surface in the sun hoping it would be an even flat mattress. I would definitely not recommend buying this for an infant. No way to return it since it can not be repackaged. Not a happy Amazon buyer.
customer_reviews.author: Amy W

customer_reviews.title: Did not expand, seems too soft
customer_reviews.text: I followed all of the instructions and allowed the mattress to lay flat for 48 plus hours in a will ventilated room. Even removed the cover for more air exposure, and so far only one end of the mattress has expanded. The opposite end is still just as flat as when we first took it out of the packaging. I'll give it a few more days to see if it expands before returning. My other concern is that the mattress seems a little too soft for an infant. I know that for safety reasons, infants need to sleep on an even, firm mattress and so far this one is neither. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality
customer_reviews.text: This mattress comes in a compressed roll but quickly expands to full size when unpacked and put in a crib or toddler bed. I was a bit skeptical after reading some of the negative reviews but after receiving the product I can't figure out why anyone would leave a bad review. The mattress is good quality and safe to use.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Good buy for the price.
customer_reviews.text: My son likes it and says it’s comfy. It’s actually a very firm mattress. For the price it’s a darn good buy. The review asked for my stars on how water proof it is. I put 2 because it’s a mattress it’s going to soak up liquid if spilled on it. It’s not like it has a special cover or anything.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle McGrath

customer_reviews.title: Excellent purchase
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this thing. I bought it as soon as my kid was born, and she used it for two and a half years until she got a toddler bed. And of course, with any kids, there were plenty of opportunities to see how well this leaked or how easy it was to clean up. It's very easy to clean up and take care of, we didn't have anything leak through the protective covering into the actual foam, and it seemed quite supportive. Excellent purchase
customer_reviews.author: Clark

customer_reviews.title: Budget Mattress without sacrificing quality! 5 star +!!!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter used to wake up with any noise during her night sleep. She was getting used to not wake up in the middle of the night but then she did because her old mattress was so flimsy but now she doesn't and I can rest more hours straight, yay! If you are a mom and have babies get this, it's very firm and comfy. If you are on a budget but don't want to sacrifice quality, this it! Order now...and I'm not even sponsored
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan

customer_reviews.title: Well made mattresses :) :) :)
customer_reviews.text: I ordered TWO of these Graco mattresses for my twin Grandaughters'. There is NO smell whatsoever when I took plastic off, so I have no idea why people put reviews up that's not true. They came vacuum packed and they took their flat shape in seconds...These are "BEAUTIFUL" mattresses. I would highly recommend to anyone! Worth every penny! :) :) :)
customer_reviews.author: Edgmont, Pa

customer_reviews.title: Not soft
customer_reviews.text: Good value but not very soft. I put blankets under baby to make softer. For the price I expected better. My daughter bought a mattress for $40 more and 100x softer. So invest a few dollars more and get one good from the start is my advice on this mattress.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Nordstrom

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase, 100% reccomend!
customer_reviews.text: Was a little nervous at first to purchase this mattress for my 6 month old given some people's reviews but if you do give the mattress a full 24 hours to puff up & fluff the end that isnt as proofed up initially the mattress completely inflates and is amazing. It is quiet and my infant who is very difficult when it comes time to sleep, sleeps on this mattress 100x better than her old mattress. I 100% would recommend this product to anyone looking for a safe & great quality mattress for their little one .
customer_reviews.author: dmoney127

customer_reviews.title: Would definitely buy again if
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t have any issues with the mattress fluffing to the right size. It also smelled fine upon arrival. It is more firm than I had expected being that it is foam, but it’s not uncomfortable. I now have two of these mattresses (for my 2 1/2 year old and 8 month old) and they both sleep well on them. Well worth the price in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Uneven expansion - buyer beware.
customer_reviews.text: It seems a quality mattress and the waterproof cover is well sewn but a week later this thing still hasn’t fully expanded though I’ve followed instructions. One entire side is about 1’’+ thinner than it should be, so I can’t even use it safely in a crib (uneven sleeping surface would cause my kid to roll due to imbalanced expansion). Amazon customer service indicated I’d need to ship back he original product for a refund or get a replacement of the same product (don’t want it - doesn’t work as described). Thing is, it’s now impossible to jam this thing back into the original box. Annoying.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: No complaints
customer_reviews.text: Im 6 months pregnant and have been doing alot of research on the right bed for our babygirl. I tried to look at some cheaper ones, but with cheaper prices, you get cheaper quality. This Graco crib mattress ended up being the final decision based on others reviews also. Its the perfect thickness, fits our crib perfectly, and i have absolutely no complaints about it.... Yet lol. Ill update later on down the line when I have an actual baby to put it to the test!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley 💖

customer_reviews.title: 100% SATISFACTION!!
customer_reviews.text: I'm not sure why this mattress has bad reviews. Maybe they upgraded the 2020 version. It is very comfortable for my baby. The outer cover is wash machine safe. Its amazing. It expanded within 12 hours. Mh baby sleeps ALL night for 10hrs straight. It does not put of a "odor" as people are saying. Over all wonderful mattress and i would recommend this to any parent.
customer_reviews.author: Kari

customer_reviews.title: Great mattress
customer_reviews.text: This mattress came vacuum sealed which was great. We let it sit for a full day once we opened it to give it time to fluff up. It’s nice and sturdy but light weight as well. Fit our crib perfect! Cat and baby approves!
customer_reviews.author: Abby R.

customer_reviews.title: Chubby the English loves it!!
customer_reviews.text: It’s a hit with the 80lb English Bulldog. Was looking for a pet bed with more firmness but after a few tries I had to go with a baby crib bed after reading some other reviews. Chubby seems to love it. He’s a heavy boy. I let mattress sit on table for 2 full days and it’s solid and he doesn’t sink in but has comfort. He loves it! No smell at all to it and that white sheet is a cover. We are satisfied customers.
customer_reviews.author: KG

customer_reviews.title: Bought one last year that fully expanded, this one did not
customer_reviews.text: It's been 48hrs and this matteress is flat on one side. I am so disappointed. Not sure how to roll it all back up and send it back, but a baby cant sleep on it like this. It seems they need better quality control. Contacting the company and amazon to find out how to resolve this problem. ****Amazon was great and they are sending another one. I'll update after this one arrives.
customer_reviews.author: Russell

customer_reviews.title: This was a Lifesaver!!
customer_reviews.text: My son would wake up every time we him on his old crib mattress. So you can imagine bed time was HORRIBLE. I bought this praying he'd be more comfortable and sleep longer at night. So far he's sleeping longer AND he doesn't wake up when I lay him in it! Literally a lifesaver and never getting a different mattress for future kiddos. On a side note. Take the cover off to let it expand. Mine fully expanded quickly by doing this. THANK YOU GRACO. You have given me a better night's sleep and a bit of my sanity back!
customer_reviews.author: Kate B.

customer_reviews.title: I used this for my baby born 2017
customer_reviews.text: Two years still as fully as the day I bought it. The cover makes for an easy clean up for her potty training now! She sweats so much in my bed my not in this one and sleeps much better. I absolutely loved this mattress and I wish it came in twin size since we just bought a bunk bed.
customer_reviews.author: D Family

customer_reviews.title: Decent mattress
customer_reviews.text: My 22 month old has used this mattress for about 8 months now he sleeps so peacefully n really seems to enjoy his mattress honestly my only complaint is that after he had a few accidents the mattress cover is stained other then that I'd recomend it 7 months after my initial review my opinion hasn't changed but we've learned it isnt water resistant and will be throwing it out for a new one I'd still recommend if ur child isnt a bed wetter
customer_reviews.author: Adora Washpon

customer_reviews.title: Really like these, would buy again.
customer_reviews.text: Because of other reviews I took the outer cover off to help the mattress get air to expand. I had no issues with it fully expanding. I got two mattresses, one didn't have to be touched, the second one i helped it along by fluffing it along the edge every hour or so as it expanded. I think it may just be some mattresses require a little help to expand, since i got two and only one required extra help. I'm using one for a two year old and one for an infant. I think the firmness is good for both ages. I really like the mattress and wish i had found these sooner!
customer_reviews.author: Gedwards

customer_reviews.title: Mommy and LO are happy
customer_reviews.text: We are very happy with this purchase overall. Didn't have an issue with it airing out. One corner seems a little less filled out than the others but doesn't really affect the sleep of my LO in my opinion. Didn't notice any smell from the beginning. I love that it's lighter than other mattresses and is very firm.
customer_reviews.author: JCVD

customer_reviews.title: Honestly the best
customer_reviews.text: This has been one of the best purchases for our baby. We wanted a good mattress but didn't wanted to spend 200 dlls in it, since everybody told us our baby wasn't even gonna use her cirb. It turn out our daughter loves her crib and this mattress very much, she sleeps very well in it, and what I like more is very breathable and stays cool, is very light so is easy to move to change the sheets and the price is unbeatable. The cover is super water resistant but we still use a mattress cover and her fitted sheet.
customer_reviews.author: Graciela Leal

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: Our toddler has been sleeping on this mattress for four nights in for naps now :-) so far he seems to sleep great on it! I didn't notice a smell when I opened the mattress. I did let it sit on the floor for about a week before putting in his bed. I'm going to recommend my sister-in-law who needs another toddler mattress for their little guy. I can't speak to the water-resistance of it since that issue has not come up yet
customer_reviews.author: mollymol08

customer_reviews.title: Better than spring mattress by far
customer_reviews.text: Awesome crib bed! So much softer than the spring mattress that my son had when he was a baby! I hope it holds up over time ! I saw reviews that complained about the chemical smell but we didn’t have that issue. We let the mattress decompress in an open room for about 20 hours and it didn’t have any smell at all :) baby slept great!!!
customer_reviews.author: Karina Nilson

customer_reviews.title: Great product and worth ever penny
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love the durability of this mattress. I have a 2 yr old that is not quite ready for the toddler bed but is learning the meaning of time out. So, because he won't sit on a time out stool safely (tantrums are bad) I put him in his crib and he can not injure himself. This survives head butts and kicking and you never could tell. It feels firm but soft enough to be comfortable and snuggly. He tends to sleep in one spot and after several months you cant tell he has a fave spot. I would purchase this as a baby gift for someone.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase, just what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.text: Great purchase!! The mattress was fully finished lifting by the first day.. measures about 4.5 inches and feels comfortable!
customer_reviews.author: liz

customer_reviews.title: Super mattress to transition from a Pack N Play!
customer_reviews.text: Upon purchasing the mattress and reading the other reviews, i was relucant from the somewhat bad reviews this had recieved. First, it does not smell. Second it expanded perfectly and slid comfortably in the bed with no issues! So in less than 24 hours it was ready for my son. He slept on it great and we didn’t notice any changes in his sleep. Finally, it’s not an expensive mattress (or as expensive as most) but i have 0 complaints and I recommend it!!
customer_reviews.author: Sybille K

customer_reviews.title: Great product and affordable
customer_reviews.text: I cannot rate sleep or comfort yet which I know are probably biggies for others. But the mattress is definitely water proof considering my mother-in-law’s new puppy marked the mattress as we were putting the bed together (which we got out with ease & the cover is washable <by hand>). However, the mattress is firm and fully expanded just like the company stated it would. The picture of the mattress in the crib is the mattress after being opened for 3 days. Overall, very happy thus far and will update review if needed if our little one does not sleep well on it.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki

customer_reviews.title: I won’t recommend it
customer_reviews.text: Price is great. Mattress is uneven after sitting on the floor for about 70 hours. I’ve washed the cover, but when I’ve attempted to put it back zipper broke. I can still use the mattresses , I do need to purchase mattress protector because if the original cover gets soiled I won’t be able to take it off and wash it ( no zipper). Mattress is much softer than my previous spring one, but it’s not too soft . Idea is great, product quality not so much
customer_reviews.author: Agnieszka J.

product_meta.title: Graco Premium Foam Crib and Toddler Mattress in a Box – GREENGUARD Gold Certified, Non-Toxic, Breathable, Removable Washable Water Resistant Outer Cover
product_meta.description: Style:Premium MattressThe Graco Premium Foam Crib & Toddler Bed Mattress is the best mattress choice for your newborn, infant, or toddler. Awarded the 2020 Women's Choice Award for 9 out of 10 Customer Recommended Crib & Toddler Mattress, the Graco Premium Foam Crib & Toddler Bed Mattress is the ideal recommended firmness for infants, and is designed to fit any standard full-size crib and toddler bed. This mattress features a water-resistant, removable, and washable cover making it easy for parents to keep their baby's sleep environment clean & cozy. The ideal firmness for infant safety and development, this mattress features a core made of high-quality, breathable foam to maximize air flow. Backed by a 6-year limited manufacturer's warranty, the Graco Premium Foam Crib & Toddler Bed Mattress is GREENGUARD Gold certified, free of prohibited phthalates, lead, and mercury, and meets or exceeds all applicable ASTM International, CPSC, and federal flammability standards. To wash the outer cover, hand wash or machine wash with cold water on delicate cycle, and hang to dry only (do not place in dryer). For optimal performance, unroll your mattress within 2 weeks of purchase to allow for full and proper expansion, in a room temperature setting. Graco mattresses are exclusively manufactured by Storkcraft, an industry leader in baby & kids furniture since 1945.
feature_bullets: MATTRESS IN A BOX: This crib and toddler mattress ships compressed in a lightweight box for ultimate convenience; For optimal performance, unroll your mattress within 2 weeks of purchase to allow for proper expansion in a room temperature setting. The mattress cover is made up of 100% Polyester

WATER-RESISTANT, REMOVABLE, WASHABLE OUTER COVER: This crib mattress’ soft outer cover is water-resistant, removable and machine washable; Gently unzip the outer cover, machine (or hand) wash in cold water (delicate cycle only, no bleach), and hang dry (do not place in dryer machine) to keep your child’s sleep environment fresh, clean, and cozy
RECOMMENDED MATTRESS FIRMNESS FOR BABY: Recommended mattress firmness for infant's safer sleep; Mattress core made of high-quality, breathable foam to maximize air flow

RIGOROUSLY TESTED AND CERTIFIED: This mattress is GREENGUARD Gold certified, free of prohibited phthalates, lead, and mercury, meets or exceeds all applicable ASTM International and CPSC safety standards, and meets all applicable federal flammability standards; Backed by a 6-year limited warranty

FITS STANDARD FULL-SIZE CRIB AND TODDLER BED: This crib mattress is designed to fit any standard full-size crib and toddler bed; Length (52 inches) x Width (27.6 inches) x Height (up to 5 inches); Weight (7 pounds); Mattress made of polyurethane foam

specifications.Additional product features: Machine Washable, Waterproof, Greenguard, Safe, Recommended mattress firmness, Removable Cover
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars11,654 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
